title: Gingrich Is Willing to Testify to Jan. 6 Panel, His Lawyer Says
description: Mr. Gingrich would speak about his role in efforts to overturn the 2020 election results, a move his lawyer suggested should spare him from having to testify in a separate inquiry in Georgia.
dc:creator: Richard Fausset
media:description: Congressional investigators said they had obtained evidence that Newt Gingrich had urged the Trump campaign to run ads that amplified false claims about election fraud.
